coursesList.title: Algebra Basics
coursesList.details: This course covers foundational algebraic concepts including equations, expressions, and basic operations. Suitable for beginners.

coursesList.title: Geometry Fundamentals
coursesList.details: Explore the fundamental principles of geometry, including shapes, angles, and spatial reasoning. Recommended for high school students or beginners.

coursesList.title: Physics 101
coursesList.details: Introduction to the basic concepts of physics including mechanics, thermodynamics, and electromagnetism. Suitable for beginners with an interest in physics.

coursesList.title: Biology Basics
coursesList.details: Explore the fundamentals of biology covering cells, genetics, and ecosystems. Ideal for beginners or students with a curiosity about life sciences.

coursesList.title: English Grammar Mastery
coursesList.details: A comprehensive guide to English grammar rules, suitable for non-native speakers and those aiming to improve their grammar skills.

coursesList.title: Introduction to Python Programming
coursesList.details: A beginner-friendly course to learn Python programming language from scratch, suitable for aspiring programmers and data enthusiasts.

coursesList.title: Data Science Essentials
coursesList.details: Key concepts and tools for data analysis and visualization using Python. Suitable for beginners in data science.

coursesList.title: HTML & CSS Foundations
coursesList.details: Learn the basics of HTML and CSS, the building blocks of web design and development. Suitable for beginners.

coursesList.title: JavaScript Basics
coursesList.details: Introduction to the JavaScript programming language covering basic syntax, functions, and DOM manipulation.

coursesList.title: React Advance
coursesList.details: Introduction to the JavaScript programming language covering basic syntax, functions, and DOM manipulation.

coursesList.title: Mongodb Basic
coursesList.details: Introduction to the JavaScript programming language covering basic syntax, functions, and DOM manipulation.
